name: Dark Skies - After the Storm Week 101
name_original: Dark Skies - After the Storm Week 101
description:
A game developed for Week 101 - Theme  : After the storm

Control

WASD for movement and SPACEBAR to interact, 

Concept

Pilot the plain under heavy storm(screen rumble) , fix areas of the plane to keep control of the plane and maintain communication with the passengers to avoid distress which will lower you fixing capabilities

Credits

Taiger (Programming and pixel art)

iamoneabe (Music and sounds composer and other art contributions)
